paper_abstract: In this paper, we prove that 2-connected graphs have either a dominating path or two disjoint paths, wherein the length of the two paths is bounded by the minimum among n and a parameter defined on the neighborhood condition of any four independent vertices of the graph. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Algorithm for two disjoint long paths in 2-connected graphs
